thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com | 5 of 9
thread.title: DeAnn,

author: DeAnn,
title: DeAnn,
text: Was looking for good basic solid furniture for daughter's room.. Affordable, and solid.. did not arrive on time, but was not due to the company, was an issue w wrong address w the shipper. When I called to inquire, the company was very helpful, provided where I needed to call, and to call them back if I did not get an answer.. I had good cust service from shipper as well, and things were resolved efficiently, as we noted an address entry error (my part).. The furniture we chose was heavy, not feminine - but I like it, and all was boxed very well, no damage.. Bed was only thing that required assembly, and very impressively solid at that.. Not overly bulky, tho solid.. would be great for a cabin or guest house/ vaca home/rental - for good quality and durability both, as well as affordability.
